title: test_user_login_functionality
description: Verify that the /auth/login endpoint allows users to log in with valid credentials and returns an authentication token.

title: test_user_registration_process
description: Ensure the /auth/register endpoint successfully registers a new user with valid data and returns appropriate confirmation.

title: test_user_logout_process
description: Check that the /auth/logout endpoint properly logs out an authenticated user and invalidates the session token.

title: test_get_current_user_info
description: Validate that the /auth/me endpoint returns the current authenticated user's information when provided with a valid token.

title: test_get_active_public_alerts
description: Confirm that the /public/alerts endpoint returns a list of active public alerts accessible without authentication.

title: test_create_new_alert
description: Test the /alerts POST endpoint to create a new system alert with valid data and verify it is stored correctly.

title: test_update_existing_alert
description: Verify that the /alerts/{id} PUT endpoint updates an existing alert's details correctly when provided valid data and alert ID.

title: test_delete_alert
description: Ensure the /alerts/{id} DELETE endpoint removes the specified alert and returns appropriate success response.

title: test_list_disease_cases
description: Check that the /cases GET endpoint returns a list of disease cases accessible to the authenticated user.

title: test_create_disease_case
description: Validate that the /cases POST endpoint allows creation of a new disease case with valid input data and returns the created case details.
